body:
Dear Greg,


Hi,


I am a beginner with Radiance and am working with the head release. I teach
in a school of Architecture in India. I was looking for a systematic
training. Will attending the workshop help me in this regards. I have gone
through the basic tutorials on the web, as well as the book Rendering with
Radiance. I have also gone through the earlier web uploads of previous
workshops.


Kindly advise.


Alpana
